title: ECOUNT ERP
description: Ecount is a cloud-based ERP who has been in the industry as leader for 20 years. This system allows unlimited access anytime and anywhere. There are up to 60,000 unique companies worldwide that is currently using Ecount, imagine if each company has multiple users, the number of users can easily reach a million! With our unchanging price since 1999, clients stay with us for a long time.
